features: 100% Natural Horsehair and Tampico Bristles. Enjoy this broom with its fine bristles. Horsehair is soft and will collect all dust. Tampico is a harder material and will keep the bristles stiff and in shape.
Easy to use on all surfaces.
Lightweight under 1 pound makes it ease to sweep and takes away pain from your hands.
Swiveling motion makes cleaning under furniture and chairs so much easier, while allowing youto plain clean much faster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this broom!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, now it’s finally happened. I’ve clearly lost my wits. I’m all excited about a broom, for goodness sake! In my defense, however, this is no ordinary broom. It’s sleek, lightweight, wide, and yet sturdy, all at the same time. It works remarkably well. The bristles are short, but soft - somehow the perfect combo for moving dirt and dust efficiently, leaving behind not even a trace! I’ve never had a broom that I’ve found so easy to use. Gone are the days of pushing/pulling a wide, heavy broom, having to retrace over and over to get everything swept up; what a workout that could be! This broom seems to glide effortlessly. Never knew a broom could even do that! It just arrived this afternoon, and I’ve already ordered another one for a friend. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It is inoperable
reviews.reviewText: I like the bristles, and I like the lightweight yet wide for quick floor sweep, but the three-part pole of this broom does not attach properly, which/ makes the broom inoperable. The only way I could use the broom is if I superglue the 3 parts pole, but it does not guarantee that it will work for long, so I decided to return the product. I would buy again if, in the near future, I see that the manufacturer fixed the flawed design and made this broom work, but for now, I would not recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job.
reviews.reviewText: Great, light broom that stores easily. Wasn't expecting it to be quite so skinny, but it still does what a broom needs to and fits under furniture well. Bristles pick up a ton, and I think it does a better job than the synthetics I've used, and is better for all of the wood and laminate floors I clean. It's like a Swiffer, but better when you have lots of actual dirt to gather up (like after a rain) and also gathers dog hair quite well. I bought this hybrid because I thought the horse hair brush a client had did a much better job on the floor, but I needed something easier to transport. Overall, would purchase again. The only improvement I would make would be to add another row of bristles, but for the price, I won't complain. Time will tell if the handle will hold up, but I love how light it is, and that the head swivels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight and easy
reviews.reviewText: Sweeps very smoothly. Big size is a bonus-makes weeping faster. Picks up dust well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not quite what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I used search to find a push broom and this came up. which this is NOT a push broom and CANNOT be used in that fashion. It is a pull broom. They do not advertise as such, search in Amazon just picks it up that way. The photos and graphics indicates that this swivels, which it does. Unfortunately it swivels the wrong way for my purposes, parallel with the broom v perpendicular. Great for a regular broom I guess but don’t see how a parallel pivot does any good. Did not try handle just attachéd to the old one. This is a GREAT broom for near vertical sweeping which is why I am keeping it. Gets fine dust very well and is very ligh and maneuverable. If you are looking for just a broom this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like it would rather the handle be one piece. I got this one because I couldn't get the fuller brush original one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Hard to put together
reviews.reviewText: Ordered two of them both came with the pieces not being able to attach

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This broom is very lightweight and the bristles are too soft. After a short while the bristles are turned one way. The handle is a thin aluminum, hollow and not too sturdy. I purchased this on sale. I would not pay full price for this.
